questions.quote: You're under arrest for the attempted murder of Cosmo Kramer.
But you gave me a ticket to the Super Bowl.  Hand it over, Whatley.
What're you talking about, Wilhelm. You popping pills? You got the crazies again?
Boy, if I could meet a hostess, we could open up our own place.
Hey, you know what? This is all your mail. They're puttin' it in my box now.
Would you like a Pepto-Bismol? I keep them in my wallet...!   Do you think he liked it?
Of course he's been in touch with him. He's left two messages. He just hasn't heard back yet, that's all.
Sometimes at restaurants she talks to her food: 'Ooh, Mr. Mashed Potatoes, you are sooo goood.'
I thought Johnny was very rude to you. He didn't even let you talk.
Well, cause we were just saying we were going to ask you to come up to the country with us this weekend.  Susan's father has a cabin up there.  But, eh, all right, well.
